status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7o1dj","text":"Dehydrate   of the lipid mixture (40% DOPC, 20% DOPE, 20% DOPS, 20% liver phosphatidylinositol, Avanti Polar Lipids) in a glass tube using a gentle N2 stream.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.4","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8be8v","text":"Allow the lipids to dry   in a vacuum desiccator to remove excess chloroform.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bgrdk","text":"Rehydrate the dried lipids by adding   HEPES   and   NaCl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":45,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"25","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"","id":0,"number":"7.5"}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"200","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7vu18","text":"Perform 10 cycles of freeze-thaw by immersing the lipids in liquid nitrogen for a few seconds and then in a   water bath.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":108,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3bt8k","text":"Sonicate the lipids using a small probe tip sonicator at 50% power in 2-second on/off cycles for a total of     and a water mixture.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":108,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":110,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e53sr","text":"Prepare a kinase dilution buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9mi8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"221se","text":"Kinase dilution buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"s7ku","text":"      HEPES pH 7.5  25 mM    NaCl  200 mM    MgCl2  10 mM    MnCl2  1 mM    TCEP  2 mM  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":88}],"data":{}},{"key":"d8neb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["116","83"],"data":[["HEPES pH 7.5","25 mM"],["NaCl","200 mM"],["MgCl\u003csub\u003e2\u003c/sub\u003e","10 mM"],["MnCl\u003csub\u003e2\u003c/sub\u003e","1 mM"],["TCEP","2 mM"]],"guid":"5FF0B3064CFA44AC9AE73B801E8E2F26","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["HEPES pH 7.5","25 mM"],["NaCl","200 mM"],["MgCl\u003csub\u003e2\u003c/sub\u003e","10 mM"],["MnCl\u003csub\u003e2\u003c/sub\u003e","1 mM"],["TCEP","2 mM"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"33l91","text":"In a reaction tube, combine the following components:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bvo90","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"feajk","text":"      50 nM PI3KC3-C1  9 μL    0.1 mg/mL SUVs in the 2x lipid dilution\n  buffer  9 μL    500 μM ATP in the same buffer  2 μL  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":126}],"data":{}},{"key":"cio33","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["354",48],"data":[["50 nM PI3KC3-C1","9 μL"],["0.1 mg/mL SUVs in the 2x lipid dilution buffer","9 μL"],["500 μM ATP in the same buffer","2 μL"]],"guid":"7D7D1EDBFBAA4624BB0B0BA33AFFE0B6","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["50 nM PI3KC3-C1","9 μL"],["0.1 mg/mL SUVs in the 2x lipid dilution buffer","9 μL"],["500 μM ATP in the same buffer","2 μL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}
